About the Authors
Erica Palmcrantz Aziz is a raw-food educator and has been a high-raw vegan for almost nine years. She is the coauthor of The Green Smoothie Miracle: Your Way to Increased Energy, Weight Loss, and Happiness; Raw Food: A Complete Guide for Every Meal of the Day; and Raw Desserts: Mouthwatering Recipes for Cookies, Cakes, Pastries, Pies, and More.
